Oh man, so my parents decided to up and quit at the end of this semester (Making this the last week) and they've been trying to keep it a secret from the students until today.
Word got out because one of the sped teachers was talking to another in front of their IEP kids and then the telephone tag started.

sped = special education, IEP = individualized education plan.

Live in Indian Hill and your kids get into the best school.
I've been told it's about city services and land value.
We have this really juncky trailer park right across the street from our neighbourhood.
Best locations get the best schools, which get the best service, which attracts people, then business, and value goes up.
It's one of the many reasons I dislike cities.
A quick note. America has only seen crime rates steadily decline since the 90s. Currently we're experiencing roughly the same rates as those seen in the 60s.
